title: My earnings balance was deducted by the amount invoiced, but I have yet to receive payment. What is the reason for this?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I haven't received my earnings even though the earnings balance was deducted.

sections.title: Cause
content: The payment date is 30 days from receipt of the invoice.

sections.title: Resolution
content: When you see funds deducted from your account, payment has been processed.

However, this does not mean the funds have been paid - it means they have been approved in our system. The balance in your Unity Ads will not necessarily change immediately after you send the invoice.
